text:
aur chotu roomie...

sach bataun tere jaise banda bht kam milte hein, tu wo hai jo dosti ko kabhi peeche nhi chodta hai, ..frst year se hi, irritate karta rehta thağŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ movie dekhne ke time pe bhi light off nhi karta tha, crescendo ke time tera contribution koi nhi bhul sakta, akela hi antakshari jeeta diya thağŸ”¥ğŸ˜‚, le lena wo trophy,ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ kaafi support kiya hai mujhe jab mein bilkul hopeless tha regarding bodyğŸ˜‚, but kya bataun jitna bhi try karun tere jitna nhi bana saktağŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚,. 

galaxy ke time tera hss, oat pe tera poem,ğŸ˜€ğŸ˜€ mast tha, humesha dance room aata tha, prep dekhne ke liyeğŸ˜‚ uske baad bc jabse baddi harkat ki mujhe com ke exam se pehle uthaya nhi, bc exam khatam ho gaya, tab utha rha tha 'tera aaj exam tha na'ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ uske faad fake hc admission ,khichidi ke jagah hospital mein chicken biriyani laanağŸ˜‚, uske baad kaafi time sae mein beet gaye, jab mein wapas aata tha tu so rha tha, firs subah uthte tu chala jaata thağŸ˜”, chal koi nhi, tune kabhi motivation down nhi kiya, kaafi support kiya tha during my events,..unlucky ki tera ligament injury ho gaya, nhi toh kitna aage khelta football,..uske baad mein hospital mein milna ğŸ˜€ğŸ˜€ bhale hi mein itna dhyaan nhi de paaya thağŸ˜” absos humesha rhega ki tumhare saath trip pe nhi jaa paaya ğŸ˜”, bholleyball mast khelte theğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚  bht zyada khelte the humğŸ˜‚ squaash ek baar mere saath khela tha ,yaad hai maza aa gaya thağŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ corona mein itna baat nhi ho paaya, fir bhi tu saath nhi chhoda, sachmein bht acha hai be tu, tera job related baatein bht yaad aata tha, fir campus mein sabse acha laga jab tu bola tu ies ke liye prep karegağŸ™ğŸ™ hatts off yaar , yeh choti si baat se pata nhi kaafi respect aa gaya tha,. mann lagake padhna podh dena ,aur fir badddddiiii si party dena, party farty toh deta hi nhiğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚, aur bc speaker ke paise maine diye tha ,.mujhe yaad haiğŸ˜‚ chal koi nhi, humesha hi aise rehna , down to earth, motivate karta rehna aur chutiye jokes sunate rehnağŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ humesha sabse baatein ko dhyaan se sunna ...
wo din yaad hai, kisiko bhi gaali try karni ho, jaa avinash ko değŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ ....aage bhi yaad rakhna,.  aur maaf karna mein endgame abtak nhi dekha hun ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ 


tada
author: Aaishi  Ashirbad

text: Choti ch*t...chotu bsdk ...best athletic physique..i would never get the difference between parna patka pagdi xD xD...sabse mast first interaction tha, jisko bhi gaali dena nhi aata tha avinash ko gaali deke practice karte the ..humesha yaad rhega, jab galaxy ke time tu chupke cc chala jaata tha..then comes the winter camp... jab tu chutiyon ke tarah room saaf rakhta tha, khud bsdk ganda pair se bed ke upar jaata tha , aur bc subhankar aur mujhe kitna sunata tha...aur saath mein TT raat bhar with Avneesh.. tujhe toh pata hi hai , in frst summer, you told me frst to join a gym, warna mein ab frst year ke jaise hi dikhta...uske baad toh tu khaandaan ka naam roshan kar diya, gensec in 2nd year( bht bada achievement)...humesha hi dur rehta tha, busy busy busy......then subah subah football practice mein kitne bure tareeke se mujhe nutmeg karke chala jaata tha...mujhe tujhse aur bht kuch seekhna tha but uss bc subhankar ke chakkar mein pair injur karwa liya...lucknow mein bht mazaa kiye.. uske baad toh you know sabse regretful event hua(hall 3 mein) , jab mein soch nhi paaya tha kya shi hai kya galat...hope ki tu yeh sab bhool jaaye xD...then comes the most interative quarantine period.. mast the wo din..saath mein neeche baithke khaana , kunal ka gpl, parag ka jhoot(s) xD.....aise toh memories likhte likhte khatam hi nhi honge xD...bas last mein yeh kehna tha,uss din jo discuss kiye the,. you are built for managerial skills(leadership) , yeh coding foding jobs ke peeche mat bhaag xD...apna interest dhoond(IAS FIAS banno desh ko aage badhao) , humesha yeh mat kehna ' mujhe toh pata hi nhi kya karna hai aage'......aur toh ek saal hai beetane ko...aur memories banenge...
author: Aaishi  Ashirbad

text:
Aur chutiye...
Kya batao tere baarein mein, sabse cool banda tu hi hai wing mein..frst mile the dhoni ke related jab wing pe discuss ho rha tha, ...treasure hunt ke time kaafi admire kiya thağŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ yeh bc kaise jeet gaya, bagal wale room pe rehta hai xD,  fir crescendo ke time,tere bakchod dance ke wajah se jeet gaye the humğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ then toh bc galaxy aa gayi thi, maza aa gaya tha jab tu mujhe sikha rha tah, pehle kaise thoda sa bhi coordination nhi ho rha thağŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚..subah subah oat pe practice karna, class  mein so jaanağŸ˜‚, then dheere dheere mai sae pe chala gaya, tu dance karta rehta tha, sabse badhia baat jab bhi terese kuch bhi seekhne ke liye jaata tha( dance related, ya fir kuch bhi) tu kaafi interest se samjhaata hai,ğŸ˜›ğŸ˜› sabse bada regret toh rhega tumhare saath trip pe nhi gaya thağŸ˜”, dynamics wala memory humesha yaad rhegağŸ˜›,  saath mein volleyball, centre netter combo, mast thağŸ˜€ğŸ˜€,  saath mein chicken biriyani,' get out ' dekhke subah ke 4 baje darr rha thağŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ fir quarantine mein saath mein khaana, handstand seekh gaya mein, for 3-4 s,ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ but all credits to you , jab bhi main terese bola seekhne ke kiye, tu kabhi bhi mana kiya, hall 12 mein kitne volleyballğŸ˜€ğŸ˜€ ...ab toh aur ek saal hai saath mein, jaldi naukri lagwa le,, fir ek bakchod si duo karenge, graduation se pehleğŸ˜€ğŸ˜€....kabhi bhulna nhi,..bye
author: Aaishi  Ashirbad

text:
Aur parth bhai!!! ğŸ¼ğŸ¼
Bht kuch hai likhne ko, ğŸ˜€ğŸ˜€ğŸ˜€ kuch kuch idhar daal dete hein
Bht acha aadmi hai be tu, assgn wagera jugaadne mein tu hi ,bina bole party dene mein, yaad toh hoga hi robot motion planning mein kaise mere liye assgn jugaada tha(hall 12 printing roomğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚), arihant kon uss bechare ka shakal yaad hogağŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ chal koi nhi, pakda gaya tha main but that was worth remembering,ğŸ˜›

back to december 2017, winter camp mein  first interaction hua tha , tab pata chala hall 12 mein koi ğŸ¼ haiğŸ˜›, bht hi bhola sa tha bahar se, SAE mein kitne saare memories haiğŸ˜€ğŸ˜€carbon fibre driveshaft, laying, subah subah mt, spray paint, body panels ka sticker banana, ...........kitne baar saath mein market jaanağŸ˜‚, goa event toh mast tha, beach volleyballğŸ˜€ğŸ˜€, tu toh nhi aaya ,bhavishya aur mein chale gaye the foreigners ke saath holi khelneğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚, bamboo bedsğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ event mein kitne maza aaye the....

And kitne baar tujhe bola gym chalte hein, beech beech mein aa jaata tha, fir chod deta hai, tera roomie nipun se kuch seekhğŸ˜› ,daily aata tha, yaar mohit chala jaayega, ab kiska mazak udayenge   'gadha hai kya, ye tu pagal hai'ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚, saath mein bachon ka interview lenağŸ˜‚ ...aur yaad rakhna google home tu de rha hai mujheğŸ˜›, abhi toh ek saal aur hai, kaafi memories banayenge,  bas kabhi bhulna mat
Tumhare rocky bhaiyağŸ˜›

text:
Aur hero/lodu...

zyada hero ban rha hai lambe baal rakhkeğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ tinder wali ka naam bata firseğŸ˜‚

tu aise ek banda hai , mujhe lagta hai jo bhi kaam tu thaan leta wo karke hi chodta hai, placement ke time, sabse zyada bharosa tere se tha,.tujhe lockdown ke time bola bhi thağŸ˜›ğŸ˜› pata nhi, kahin se alag si confidence  laa rha thağŸ˜‚ yaar kitne volleball khele beğŸ˜‚ kabhi tu netter centre hitter,.coordination mast,.baddy hall 3 mein maza aata thağŸ˜› tu humesha har game ke liye enthu se haan kar deta hai, ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ aur try karta hai best dene ko, wo baddi baat hai


sach bataun, tu kaafi irritate karta tha isi 2 mahine, but it was worth it,.yeh time aur nhi aayenge, bhand hoke room pe aata tha,.leather jacket leke chala jaata thağŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ but mein thoda over react kar diya thağŸ˜” bsdk bhand banke cool ban rha tha, utne mein se kuch nasha nhi hotağŸ˜‚pull the triggerğŸ˜‚
